title: Computer Science Resources
description: Resources to support students in their tech journeyâ€”from learning to code to finding internships and scholarships.

resources.name: ACM (Association for Computing Machinery)
resources.description: Provides access to research, online courses, webinars, and student chapter events to support computing students.

resources.name: NSBE (National Society of Black Engineers)
resources.description: Supports Black engineers with scholarships, conferences, and career development resources.

resources.name: ColorStack
resources.description: Offers mentorship, interview prep, internships, and a vibrant peer network for Black and Latinx CS students.

resources.name: Rewriting the Code (RTC)
resources.description: Empowers college women in tech through mentorship, fellowships, private job boards, and leadership development.

resources.name: SHPE (Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers)
resources.description: Supports Hispanic students in STEM with career fairs, mentorship, and leadership programs.

resources.name: SWE (Society of Women Engineers)
resources.description: Provides scholarships, professional resources, and a network for women in engineering and tech.

resources.name: CodePath
resources.description: Delivers tech training and career support tailored to first-gen and low-income students with mentorship and project-based learning.

resources.name: freeCodeCamp
resources.description: Offers free certifications and hands-on lessons in coding, data analysis, and web development.

resources.name: CS50x by Harvard
resources.description: Popular introductory computer science course covering fundamental concepts through lectures and projects.

resources.name: LeetCode / HackerRank / Codeforces
resources.description: Platforms to practice coding problems and prepare for technical interviews. Great for job prep and competitive programming.

resources.name: Exercism
resources.description: Practice programming in over 60 languages with mentor feedback and real-world coding exercises.

resources.name: Google STEP Program
resources.description: Summer internships for first- and second-year underrepresented students, with mentoring and training.

resources.name: Microsoft Explore Program
resources.description: Internship program for early-year students to explore software engineering through hands-on projects and guidance.

resources.name: Meta University Internship
resources.description: Provides underrepresented college students the opportunity to build real projects with Meta engineers.

resources.name: Code2040 Fellows Program
resources.description: Internships and leadership development for Black and Latinx CS students, with focus on career empowerment.

resources.name: HackDiversity
resources.description: Career accelerator helping underrepresented students secure tech internships with coaching and industry support.

resources.name: Tech Interview Handbook
resources.description: Free resource with guides on behavioral and technical interviews, system design, and coding challenges.

resources.name: Interviewing.io
resources.description: Platform for anonymous mock interviews with engineers, offering real-time feedback and job potential.

resources.name: Pathrise
resources.description: Mentorship-driven job search accelerator covering resume help, interview prep, and offer negotiation.

categories.name: Research and Internship Opportunities for Morgan Students

resources.name: SCMNS Opportunities Spreadsheet
resources.description: Live spreadsheet listing research, internship, and fellowship opportunities for SCMNS students at Morgan State University.

resources.name: Morgan SCMNS Research Page
resources.description: Official site listing research opportunities, internship listings, and academic support for science majors at Morgan.

resources.name: Last Mile Education Fund
resources.description: Provides emergency financial aid to low-income CS students nearing graduation to help them cross the finish line.

resources.name: Google Scholarships
resources.description: Offers scholarships and professional development opportunities for underrepresented students in tech.

resources.name: The Gates Scholarship
resources.description: Covers full cost of college for Pell-eligible minority students with strong leadership and academic performance.

resources.name: Dell Scholars Program
resources.description: Provides scholarships, mentoring, and resources for low-income, first-generation college students.

resources.name: UNCF Scholarships
resources.description: A wide range of scholarships for Black students pursuing college degrees, including computer science majors.
